When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

parameters.oSource: type: any, description: New value for property source

getIncludeMetadata.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getIncludeMetadata includeMetadata}. If set to true, will load metadata Default value is false.

setDependencyLoader.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getDependencyLoader dependencyLoader}. An object used to load content resource's dependencies. A content resource may have dependencies, e.g. if the loaded content resource is a shattered VDS file it reference other VDS files. dependencyLoader should be an object with method function load(uri: string, context: any): Promise<{buffer: ArrayBuffer, context: any}>, where uri is a reference to a dependency and context is opaque data. uri is application specific and can be a full URL or a relative file name or anything else, e.g. some identifier known to dependencyLoader. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

parameters.oDependencyLoader: type: any, description: New value for property dependencyLoader

getEnableLogger.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableLogger enableLogger}. Optional boolean parameter to enable detailed logging. Can be used to track performance issues during data streaming from SAP 3D Visualization Service. Default value is false.

setIncludeBackground.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getIncludeBackground includeBackground}. If set to true, will return nodes with the type background When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bIncludeBackground: type: boolean, description: New value for property includeBackground

getLocalMatrix.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getLocalMatrix localMatrix}.

The local transformation matrix of the node created for this content resource.

getMetadataFilter.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getMetadataFilter metadataFilter}.

Optional metadata filter that can trim the tree before sending to the client only keeping nodes that passed the filter and their parents. Default: null. Format: Comma-separated list of meta.category1.tag1.value1, meta.category2.tag2.value2. "meta." is the prefix and all metadata filters must start with it. Multiple filters are supported, they are combined using `OR` operator. Includes parent nodes of matching nodes (e.g. breadcrumb) even if they don't pass the filter.

setSourceType.!description:
Sets a new value for property {@link #getSourceType sourceType}. The source type of the content resource. Valid types:
  • vds
  • vds4
  • vds4-2d
  • svg
  • png
  • jpg
  • jpeg
  • gif
  • bmp
  • tif
  • tiff
  • stream
  • stream2d
  • ecad
  • pdf
  • auto
The source type may be omitted if this is a grouping content node.

If the source property points to an IPD Visualization service the sourceType property can be assigned value auto. The actual sourceType property will be detected by making a request to the backend.

NOTE: The tif and tiff image formats are not supported on all browsers. Source type "vds" initializes deprecated DVL namespace and uses legacy library to load and display VDS file content. If source type of "vds4" is used then new namespace based on Threejs rendering model will be used to load and display VDS file content. Since DVL namespace is deprecated in one of future releases it will be removed and source type "vds" will also use Threejs model. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

parameters.sSourceType: type: string, description: New value for property sourceType

sap.ui.vk.ContentResource.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new ContentResource. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getSource source} : any
    • {@link #getSourceType sourceType} : string
    • {@link #getSourceId sourceId} : string
    • {@link #getLocalMatrix localMatrix} : float[]
    • {@link #getName name} : string
    • {@link #getPassword password} : string
    • {@link #getUseSecureConnection useSecureConnection} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getVeid veid} : string
    • {@link #getIncludeHidden includeHidden} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getIncludeAnimation includeAnimation} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getPushPMI pushPMI} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getMetadataFilter metadataFilter} : string
    • {@link #getActivateView activateView} : string
    • {@link #getEnableLogger enableLogger} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getPushViewGroups pushViewGroups} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getIncludeBackground includeBackground} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getIncludeParametric includeParametric} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getIncludeMetadata includeMetadata} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getIncludeUsageId includeUsageId} : sap.ui.vk.IncludeUsageIdType (default: false)
    • {@link #getDependencyLoader dependencyLoader} : any
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getContentResources contentResources} : sap.ui.vk.ContentResource[]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor sap.ui.base.ManagedObject} can be used as well.

getContentResources.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getContentResources contentResources}.

Child content resources.

removeContentResource.!description: Removes a contentResource from the aggregation {@link #getContentResources contentResources}.
removeContentResource.!type: fn(vContentResource: Number | String | sap.ui.vk.ContentResource) -> sap.ui.vk.ContentResource | null

parameters.vContentResource: type: int|string|sap.ui.vk.ContentResource, description: The contentResource to remove or its index or id

setUseSecureConnection.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getUseSecureConnection useSecureConnection}. If set to false, unsecure connections will be used. Default: true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bUseSecureConnection: type: boolean, description: New value for property useSecureConnection

collectCategories.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.50.0 Content resource categories shall not be used anymore. See {@link sap.ui.vk.ContentResource#sourceType} property for selection of content type.
Collects content resource categories. The result is tested if the content resource hierarchy has the same category - 2D or 3D.

parameters.resources: type: sap.ui.vk.ContentResource[], description: The array of content resources.

setVeid.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getVeid veid}. Id of scene to retrieve tree for. Mandatory for the stream source type. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

parameters.sVeid: type: string, description: New value for property veid

getSourceProperties.!description:
Gets content resource source properties. The content resource source properties depend on the content resource source type. They are different for VDS and PNG for example. The list of possible source properties:
  • version - object
    • major - number
    • minor - number
  • compressed - boolean
  • encrypted - boolean
The source properties are optional and the list might be extended in future versions.

getSourceType.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getSourceType sourceType}. The source type of the content resource. Valid types:
  • vds
  • vds4
  • vds4-2d
  • svg
  • png
  • jpg
  • jpeg
  • gif
  • bmp
  • tif
  • tiff
  • stream
  • stream2d
  • ecad
  • pdf
  • auto
The source type may be omitted if this is a grouping content node.

If the source property points to an IPD Visualization service the sourceType property can be assigned value auto. The actual sourceType property will be detected by making a request to the backend.

NOTE: The tif and tiff image formats are not supported on all browsers. Source type "vds" initializes deprecated DVL namespace and uses legacy library to load and display VDS file content. If source type of "vds4" is used then new namespace based on Threejs rendering model will be used to load and display VDS file content. Since DVL namespace is deprecated in one of future releases it will be removed and source type "vds" will also use Threejs model.

setIncludeMetadata.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getIncludeMetadata includeMetadata}. If set to true, will load metadata When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bIncludeMetadata: type: boolean, description: New value for property includeMetadata

getPushPMI.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getPushPMI pushPMI}. If set to true, elements for PMI rendering content will be returned. Default: false. Default value is false.

getPassword.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getPassword password}.

The password to use when opening the resource.

setPushPMI.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getPushPMI pushPMI}. If set to true, elements for PMI rendering content will be returned. Default: false. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bPushPMI: type: boolean, description: New value for property pushPMI

getIncludeHidden.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getIncludeHidden includeHidden}. Send structural data for hidden objects, if false they will be omitted, reducing data size. Default: true. Default value is true.

getPushViewGroups.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getPushViewGroups pushViewGroups}. If set to true, information of view groups will be returned. Default: true. Default value is true.

getSourceId.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getSourceId sourceId}.

The unique ID of the content resource.

insertContentResource.!description: Inserts a contentResource into the aggregation {@link #getContentResources contentResources}.

parameters.oContentResource: type: sap.ui.vk.ContentResource, description: The contentResource to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the contentResource should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the contentResource is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the contentResource is inserted at the last position

setPushViewGroups.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getPushViewGroups pushViewGroups}. If set to true, information of view groups will be returned. Default: true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bPushViewGroups: type: boolean, description: New value for property pushViewGroups

setViewInfo.!description:
Sets the current scene to use the camera view information acquired from the {@link sap.ui.vk.Viewport#getViewInfo getViewInfo} method.
Internally, the setViewInfo method activates certain steps at certain animation times, and then changes the camera position, rotation and field of view (FOV) / zoom factor.

parameters.viewInfo: type: object, description: A JSON-like object containing view information acquired using the {@link sap.ui.vk.Viewport#getViewInfo getViewInfo} method.

parameters.y: type: int, description: The tap gesture's y-coordinate.

uvHorizontalTilingEnabled.!description: Is the uv horizontal tiling enabled

hasChildren.!description: The indicator showing if the node has child nodes. This property is read-only.

busyIndicatorSize.!description: The size of the BusyIndicator. For controls with a width smaller 3rem a sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Small should be used. If the size could vary in width and the width could get smaller than 3rem, the sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Auto option could be used. The default is set to sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium For a full screen BusyIndicator use sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Large.

backgroundColorBottom.!description: Viewport background bottom color in the CSS Color format

showSafeArea.!description: Shows or hides the Safe Area

showAllHotspotsTintColor.!description: Color used to highlight all hotspots when the showAllHotspots property has a value of true.

showAllHotspots.!description: Enables or disables showing of all hotspots

busyIndicatorDelay.!description: The delay in milliseconds, after which the busy indicator will show up for this control.

upDirection.!description: Camera up vector in global space (normalized x, y, z vector values)

localMatrix.!description: The local transformation matrix of the node.

visible.!description: Whether the control should be visible on the screen. If set to false, a placeholder will be rendered to mark the location of the invisible control in the DOM of the current page. The placeholder will be hidden and have zero dimensions (display: none). Also see {@link module:sap/ui/core/InvisibleRenderer InvisibleRenderer}.

veIds.!description: The node VE IDs. This property is read-only.

autoStartRendering.!description: Automatically start rendering This will allow client code to control if viewport rendering should commence automatically or not.

targetDirection.!description: Camera direction vector in global space (normalized x, y, z vector values)

nodeRef.!description: The node reference. This property is read-only.

tintColorABGR.!description:
The tint color.
The tint color is a 32-bit integer in the ABGR notation, where A is amount of blending between material color and tint color.

name.!description: The name of the node. This property is read-only.

position.!description: Camera position in global space (x, y, z coordinates)

hotspotColorABGR.!description: Color used for highlighting hotspots in the ABGR format

fov.!description: Camera frustum field of view in degree

uvVerticalTilingEnabled.!description: Is the uv vertical tiling enabled

hotspotColor.!description: Color used for highlighting hotspots in the CSS Color format

blocked.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.69 The blocked property is deprecated. There is no accessibility support for this property. Blocked controls should not be used inside Controls, which rely on keyboard navigation, e.g. List controls.
Whether the control is currently in blocked state.

showDebugInfo.!description: Shows or hides the debug info.

busy.!description: Whether the control is currently in busy state.

fieldGroupIds.!description: The IDs of a logical field group that this control belongs to. All fields in a logical field group should share the same fieldGroupId. Once a logical field group is left, the validateFieldGroup event is fired. For backward compatibility with older releases, field group IDs are syntactically not limited, but it is suggested to use only valid {@link sap.ui.core.ID}s. See {@link #attachValidateFieldGroup} or consult the {@link topic:5b0775397e394b1fb973fa207554003e Field Group} documentation.

backgroundColorTop.!description: Viewport background top color in the CSS Color format

nodeMetadata.!description: The node metadata. This property is read-only.

worldMatrix.!description: The world transformation matrix of the node.

closed.!description: The indicator showing if the node is closed. This property is read-only.

showAllDynamicContents.!description: Enables or disables showing of all dynamic contents

sap.ui.vk.threejs.Viewport.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a ThreeJs viewport. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Events
    • {@link #event:cameraChanged cameraChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:frameRenderingFinished frameRenderingFinished} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.vk.ViewportBase#constructor sap.ui.vk.ViewportBase} can be used as well.

attachCameraChanged.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:cameraChanged cameraChanged} event of this sap.ui.vk.threejs.Viewport. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.vk.threejs.Viewport itself.
attachCameraChanged.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.ui.vk.threejs.Viewport

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.vk.threejs.Viewport itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

getObjectImage.!description: Returns object as an image of desired size.

parameters.topColor: type: string, description: The sap.ui.core.CSSColor to be used for top background color
parameters.margin: type: float, description: The object margin
parameters.quaternion: type: THREE.Quaternion, description: Optional camera rotation quaternion
parameters.nodeRef: type: any, description: The node reference.
parameters.width: type: int, description: Requested image width in pixels. Allowed values are 8 to 2048, default is 256
parameters.height: type: int, description: Requested image height in pixels. Allowed values are 8 to 2048, default is 256
parameters.bottomColor: type: string, description: The sap.ui.core.CSSColor to be used for bottom background color

setViewInfo.!description:
Sets the current scene to use the camera view information acquired from the {@link sap.ui.vk.Viewport#getViewInfo getViewInfo} method.
Internally, the setViewInfo method activates certain steps at certain animation times, and then changes the camera position, rotation and field of view (FOV) / zoom factor.

In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.vk.tools.Tool#constructor sap.ui.vk.tools.Tool} can be used as well.

sap.ui.vk.MapContainer.!constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new MapContainer. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getShowNavbar showNavbar} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowHome showHome} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowMapLayer showMapLayer} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowRectangularZoom showRectangularZoom} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowZoom showZoom} : boolean (default: true)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getListPanelStack listPanelStack} : sap.ui.vk.ListPanelStack
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.vk.ContainerBase#constructor sap.ui.vk.ContainerBase} can be used as well.
